title: I Received a message in my mobile that My Mobile Number has won 800000 GBP in the 2016 COCA-COLA International. What should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: my dear friend i am very sorry to say that but you have got a fake message this is a scam do not send any reply to them because if you send any money it will cost you probably 5 to 10 rupee or more once a time my mom got same kind of message and she just reply without asking anyone that simple reply cost 25 rupee and she got nothing in their hand, hence these kind of messages are bluff for making money. do not get stuck in these kind of bullshit. after that my mom told us that she got this message so i suggest her to do not replay on these kind of messages . i am sending some more scam photos so you can look and get secure. scam images    do not trust on your luck rather then your hardwork there is not such kinds of luck. without hardwork
